Submodules¶

jaxl.envs.rollouts module¶

class jaxl.envs.rollouts.EvaluationRollout(env: DefaultGymWrapper, seed: int = 0)¶

Bases: Rollout

Interconnection between policy and environment. This executes the provided policy in the specified environment without any exploration. That is, it uses deterministic_action, which is usually implemented as the most-likely action.

rollout(params: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number | Iterable[ArrayTree] | Mapping[Any, ArrayTree] | Dict[str, Any], policy: Policy, obs_rms: bool | RunningMeanStd, num_episodes: int, buffer: ReplayBuffer = None)¶

Executes the policy in the environment.

Parameters:

  • params (Union[optax.Params, Dict[str, Any]]) – the model parameters

  • policy (Policy) – the policy

  • obs_rms (Union[bool, RunningMeanStd]) – the running statistics for observations

  • num_episodes (int) – the number of interaction episodes with the environment

  • buffer (ReplayBuffer (DefaultValue = None)) – the buffer to store the transitions with

abstract classmethod rollout(*args, **kwargs) → Any¶
class jaxl.envs.rollouts.StandardRollout(env: DefaultGymWrapper, seed: int = 0)¶

Bases: Rollout

Interconnection between policy and environment. This executes the provided policy in the specified environment using compute_action.

rollout(params: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number | Iterable[ArrayTree] | Mapping[Any, ArrayTree] | Dict[str, Any], policy: Policy, obs_rms: bool | RunningMeanStd, buffer: ReplayBuffer, num_steps: int) → Tuple[Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, Array | ndarray | bool_ | number]¶

Executes the policy in the environment.

Parameters:

  • params (Union[optax.Params, Dict[str, Any]]) – the model parameters

  • policy (Policy) – the policy

  • obs_rms (Union[bool, RunningMeanStd]) – the running statistics for observations

  • buffer (ReplayBuffer) – the buffer

  • num_steps (int) – the number of interactions to have with the environment

Returns:

the current observation and the current hidden state

Return type:

Tuple[chex.Array, chex.Array]
